traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description:
Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description:
Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: academian

traits.description:
Timmy is a bit of an egg-head. he is more scientifically minded than most other colonists.
(Just Better Pawn Generation (Continued))
traits.name: academic

traits.description:
Timmy loves beautiful things, and really cares about how his enviroment looks.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: aesthete

traits.description:
Timmy holds that one cannot encompass the divine, therefore worshipping gods is a fallacy.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: agnostic

traits.description:
Timmy just isn't an "animal person." he doesn't like animals, and for the record, they don't seem to much like him, either.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: animalabhorrent

traits.description:
Timmy loves animals. he doesn't feel quite the same about people, though.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: animalaficionado

traits.description:
Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description:
Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. he will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: animallover

traits.description:
Timmy is a natural at caring for animals. he always manages to get the most out of livestock.
(Just Better Pawn Generation (Continued))
traits.name: animalwhisperer

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description:
Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: anxious

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description:
This individual was selected by Tzeentch to be a fulcrum of knowledge and sorcery.
(Corruption - Worship)
traits.name: aspiringchampion

traits.description:
This individual was chosen by Slaanesh to be an idol of lust and perfection.
(Corruption - Worship)
traits.name: aspiringchampion

This individual was selected by Nurgle to spread pestilence.
(Corruption - Worship)
traits.name: aspiringchampion

This individual was selected by Khorne to do battle in his name.
(Corruption - Worship)
traits.name: aspiringchampion

traits.description:
This individual was selected by the Emperor to fulfill a purpose. What this purpose is, remains unclear.
(Corruption - Worship)
traits.name: aspiringsaint

traits.description:
Timmy does not believe in divinity. There are no gods among the stars, only cruel and powerful forces worthy of contempt.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: atheist

traits.description:
Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description:
Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description:
Timmy is a terrible gardener. The only thing he seems able to grow is weeds.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: brownthumb

traits.description:
Timmy loved playing with construction toys as a child, and still enjoys the thrill of "putting things together." But he tends to be a bit lost without clear instructions to follow.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: builder

traits.description:
Timmy knows his way around a cleaver. he can minimize wastage when butchering carcasses.
(Just Better Pawn Generation (Continued))
traits.name: butcher

traits.description:
Timmy enjoys preparing meat for cooking. his butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if he's dealing with animal corpses. he's terrible with mechanoids.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: butcher

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description:
Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description:
Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: catperson

This individual was selected by Khorne to do battle in his name.

This individual was selected by Tzeentch to be a fulcrum of knowledge and sorcery.
(Corruption - Worship)
traits.name: championoftzeentch

traits.description:
Timmy will teach and convert in the name of chaos itself.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: chaosfollower

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description:
This individual is a favourite of Gork, increasing its kunning.
(Corruption - Worship)
traits.name: chosenofgork

traits.description:
This individual is a favourite of Gork, increasing its ability to stomp and krump.
(Corruption - Worship)
traits.name: chosenofgork

traits.description:
Timmy is claustrophobic. he is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: claustrophobic

traits.description:
Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description:
Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description:
Timmy loves colder temperatures. he'll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: coldlover

traits.description:
Timmy is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: coordinated

traits.description:
An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description:
While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and he will try to hide or run as a first priority.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: coward

traits.description:
Timmy has a hard time seeing things clearly unless they are right in front of them.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: cranialnervepalsy

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description:
Timmy is following a chaos cult.
(Corruption - Worship)
traits.name: cultist

traits.description:
Timmy feeds on the pain on sentient beings. HE will go through unspeakable acts of depravity to still this hunger.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: darkeldardepravity

traits.description:
Timmy knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: deadshot

traits.description:
Timmy has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: decentlearner

traits.description:
Timmy can sleep through anything.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: deepsleeper

traits.description: Timmy has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks.
traits.name: deftlydodger

traits.description:
Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description:
Timmy knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: diplomat

traits.description:
Timmy is on the Path of the Warrior, embodying aspects of Khaela Mensha Khaine.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: discipleofkhaine

traits.description:
Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description:
Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description:
Timmy is a bit of a dunce, and learns at a slower rate than others.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: dullard

traits.description:
Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: dunce

traits.description:
Timmy has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: eagle-eyed

traits.description:
Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description:
Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description:
Timmy is a follower of Ynnead. The spiral towards death is the only way to free the Eldar.
(Corruption Core)

traits.description:
Timmy is an Eldar. They strive for perfection in everything they do.
(Corruption Core)

traits.description:
Timmy's was possessed and lived. he barely survived and bears the scars in body and mind.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: exorcised(broken)

traits.description:
Timmy's was possessed and lived. he bears the scars and is steeled against corruption.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: exorcised(faithful)

traits.description:
Timmy's was possessed and lived. he mind and body weren't entirely shattered.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: exorcised(stable)

traits.description:
Timmy's was possessed and lived, though it is a life of torment that he would gladly end.
(Corruption Core)

traits.description:
Timmy's life is dedicated to the divine and believes are worth to go to war for.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: fanatic

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description:
Timmy strongly believes in the divine.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: ferventbeliever

traits.description:
Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description:
In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description:
Timmy devours his meals much faster than others.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: glutton

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description:
Timmy has a passion for food preparation. his culinary creations are quite tasty, but he tends to take a while getting them "just right."
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: gourmet

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description:
Timmy is a great gardener. The only thing he wants is a greener world.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: greenthumb

Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

Timmy likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. he tends to get better prices than most people.

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description:
Timmy is a follower of Cegorach, the Laughing God.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: harlequin

traits.description:
Timmy detests manual labor, feeling that tasks such as cleaning and hauling are beneath him. he will perform such tasks more slowly than others would, and will also carry less per load when required to haul.
(More Than Capable)
traits.name: hatesdumblabor

traits.description:
Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description:
Timmy loves the heat. he'll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: heatlover

traits.description:
A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description:
Timmy has an unusually high tolerance of pain. It takes a lot to bring him down.
(Just Better Pawn Generation (Continued))
traits.name: highpaintolerance

traits.description:
Timmy refuses to accept less than his best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. he's less likely to fail when doing something, but he works slowly.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: idealist

traits.description:
Timmy is a follower of the Imperial cult. Though life may seem arduous, complicated and finally with much suffering, NAME will carry on in the knowledge, that the Emperor has a plan. And however long it may take to unfold, the Imperium of Man will prevail until such time.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: imperialendurance

traits.description:
he means well, but Timmy is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: inept

traits.description:
No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. he will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description:
Timmy is never really asleep or awake. he is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description:
Strange new ideas just appear in Timmy's mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to him, but he always seems distracted.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: inventor

traits.description:
Timmy has a high tolerance for pain.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: ironman

traits.description:
Timmy has never felt nausea in his life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to him.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description:
Timmy will regularly start slaughtering bystanders if not allowed to kill anything.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: khornate

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally kind. he has a special way of using kind words to brighten someone's day. he never insults others, and never judges people by their appearance.
traits.name: kind

traits.description:
Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

traits.description:
This individual was selected by the Emperor to fulfill a purpose. What this purpose is, remains unclear.
(Corruption - Worship)
traits.name: livingsaint

traits.description:
Timmy will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: lowpaintolerance

Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: lush

traits.description:
Timmy has a twisted secret. he treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description:
Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy has such a way with words that he always manages to cool down a tense situation. he could talk for days and people would still listen.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: masterdiplomat

traits.description:
Timmy has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between his steady, skilled hands and his inspiring bedside manner, patients in his care will have little to fear.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: mastermedic

traits.description:
Timmy always gets the best deals.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: mastertrader

Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.

traits.name: menagerist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description:
The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier just being near a large mountain.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description:
Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: neat

traits.description:
Timmy is fastidious to a fault.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: neatfreak

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description:
Timmy picks at his food, taking extra time to finish his meals.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: nibbler

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description:
Timmy is always in a good mood, for Papa Nurgle is looking after he.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: nurglite

traits.description:
Timmy doesn't fear the dark at all.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: nyctophile

traits.description:
Timmy is really afraid of the dark.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: nyctophobe

traits.description:
The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description:
Timmy is an Orkoid, meaning HIS life evolves around seemingly mindless bloodshed.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: orkmindedness

traits.description:
Timmy strives for perfection in his work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description:
Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. Timmy is one of those people.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: poormedic

traits.description:
Timmy is a very good miner. he is able to extract more from mineral deposits and is faster at mining overall.
(Just Better Pawn Generation (Continued))
traits.name: preciseminer

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description:
Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description:
Timmy walks under the gaze of Ynnead, the Aeldari god of death.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: prophetofynnead

traits.description:
Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: prude

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description:
Timmy is a epsilon-level psyker, very powerful and considered a security threat.
(Corruption Psykers)
traits.name: psykerɛ

(Corruption Psykers)
traits.name: psykeri

Timmy is a zeta-level psyker, moderately powerful and widely considered a security threat.

Timmy is a beta-level psyker, exceedingly rare and powerful enough to topple planets.

Timmy is a delta-level psyker, immensely powerful and highly dangerous if left unchecked.
(Corruption Psykers)

Timmy is an kappa-level psyker, able to subconsciously tap into the Warp without understanding it.

Timmy embodies Cegorach, the Aeldari god of mischief.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: puppeteerofcegorach

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low.

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description:
Timmy's genetics make him more resistant to radiation than normal.
(Just Better Pawn Generation (Continued))
traits.name: radiationresistant

traits.description:
Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: rebel

traits.description:
Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description:
Timmy enjoys working with rocks. his mining speed is increased, but his lack of interest in other areas slows him down when doing other jobs. And he hates working with plants.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: rockhound

traits.description:
Timmy is a modern-day Da Vinci, with a creative mind that can grasp new ideas almost effortlessly. But he's almost painfully slow when it comes to doing actual physical work.

traits.name: savant

traits.description:
Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.

Timmy embodies Khaine, the Aeldari god of war.
(Corruption Core)

Timmy is a natural at carving various materials.

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description:
Timmy has a silver tongue and he is good at convincing others to get what he wants.
(Just Better Pawn Generation (Continued))
traits.name: silver-tongued

traits.description:
Timmy seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in his care will likely fare well.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: skilledmedic

traits.description:
Timmy is always seeking new thrills.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: slaaneshi

traits.description:
Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy is not very good at getting out of the way of blows.
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description:
Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: snob

traits.description:
Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for him.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description:
Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: stoner

traits.description:
Timmy's body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: strongconstitution

traits.description:
Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: submissive

traits.description:
Timmy just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. he'll pay more than he should, and still think that he got a good deal. 
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: sucker

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description:
Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description:
Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description:
Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: transhumanist

traits.description:
Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description:
Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and he will likely convince you if given the chance.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description:
Timmy will experience mood swings, depending on how the schemes of Tzeentch unfold.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: tzeentchian

traits.description:
Subtlety? Diplomacy? Timmy barely even understands the meaning of the words.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: uncouth

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description:
Timmy has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. he is unlikely to be immobilized by it.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: unstoppable

traits.description:
Timmy follows the idea that all beings should strive to ensure the greatest good for the greatest number of beings in the galaxy.
(Corruption Core)
traits.name: utalitarianphilosophy

traits.description:
Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description:
Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description:
Timmy is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)
traits.name: weakconstitution

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description:
Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. he will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description:
Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. his bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description:
Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
(Humanoid Alien Races 2.0)
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description:
Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
(Humanoid Alien Races 2.0)
traits.name: xenophobe

races.description: A human, modified by gene engineering and designed evolutionary pressures.
races.name: astartespacemarine

races.description:
The Eldar race has a long and complex spacefaring history, so long in fact that little is known for certain about the course of their physical evolution and early planet-bound existence. The original Eldar homeworld was destroyed during the catastrophic collapse of the Eldar civilisation known as the Fall of the Eldar. The remnants of Eldar culture that survived the cataclysm preserved much of their species' history in the form of traditional stories, songs and dance. Written records, monuments and visual records were almost completely destroyed except for a few instances where they were taken aboard voidcraft fleeing from the doomed worlds.

As a humanoid race, Eldar are physically similar to humans, although not entirely identical by any means. They possess longer and cleaner limbs, and fine ascetic features with penetrating and slightly slanted, almond-shaped eyes. Their ears are also slightly pointed, but otherwise they could pass as human at first glance. The most obvious difference between humans and Eldar can only be seen when they move, for the movements of an Eldar radiate a subtle grace which is impossible for a human to emulate. This can be seen in even their slightest gestures or the dexterity with which they manipulate small objects.

The Eldar mind, while similar in general to the human psyche, is far more inclined towards extremes. Because of this, Eldar are more intelligent but also far more intense than humans. Although an Eldar and a human can both feel grief or joy, the Eldar's experience is likely to be far more extreme.
(Adeptus Xenobiologis: Eldar)
races.name: Eldar

races.description:
Gretchin or Grotz are basically a smaller subspecies of Orks, who are more cowardly than normal Orks and are usually used as living shields, to clear mine fields, are stepped on to get through difficult terrain, and sometimes even as emergency rations. Gretchins are quite low in the strict hierarchy of Ork society because of their small size (the lowest Orkoids being the Snotlings) and are often used for the dirtiest jobs like scavenging and being used as the football when the bigger Orks get bored.

While they are not as aggressive as standard Orks, they enjoy fighting weaker opponents and are less likely to flee if they comfortably outnumber their opponents. If a Gretchin is particularly wealthy, he may purchase a second-hand, worn-down, low-tech gun. These guns are mainly to reassure the Gretchin that they have a chance of killing something, provided they remember which way to hold the gun.
(Adeptus Xenobiologis: Orkoids)
races.name: Grot

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description:
A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
(Adeptus Mechanicus: Magos Xenobiologis)
races.name: human

races.description:
The Kroot originated on the world of Pech and, though their physiology is humanoid, there is evidence to suggest that the roots of their evolution may be avian in origin. They retain vestigial beaks and have a light, almost hollow bone structure, with four digits on each hand and foot. Their skin is rough with small, barbed spines, similar to the elongated quills on their heads, protruding from various locations on their flesh. Skin pigmentation ranges from earthy brown colours and dappled greens to vibrant oranges and everything in between. Depending on the feeding directions of the Kroot Shapers, the colouration of each kindred can vary quite considerably. It is also common for Kroot from each kindred to have particular tribal markings painted onto their skin. Kroot mature quickly, with their most rapid period of growth occurring in the first ten years of their lives. By the age of twelve they are considered adults and it is not unknown for Kroot to live to over a hundred years old, their skin becoming increasingly pitted and leathery in their last few years of life
(Adeptus Xenobiologis: Tau, Kroot, Vespid)
races.name: Kroot

races.description:
The dim-witted human sub-species called Ogryns (Homo sapiens gigantus) evolved on high-gravity, low-temperature prison planets. They are huge and unusually stupid for a human subrace, but unquestionably loyal to the Imperium once introduced to the faith of the Imperial Cult. Ogryns are used as the Imperial Guard's shock troops, and for this role, they are commonly outfitted with the Ripper Gun. The Ripper Gun is a weapon simple enough for them to operate, although some feral Ogryn cannot even fathom this device. Ogryn are also frequently used as bodyguards by Imperial Commanders.
(Adeptus Mechanicus: Magos Xenobiologis)
races.name: ogryn

races.description:
The pinnacle of the orkoid species: A fully grown Ork.
(Adeptus Xenobiologis: Orkoids)
races.name: Ork

races.description:
Ratlings (Homo sapiens minimus) are small, loud, hungry and lecherous Abhumans who often serve as snipers in the Astra Militarum, a role at which they excel. Ratlings also serve as cooks for Imperial Guard regiments, a skill they no doubt learned in order to feed their own seemingly bottomless stomachs; and they also have kleptomaniac tendencies, as Commissars report petty theft and illegal gambling rings increase substantially when Ratlings are attached to a platoon, company or regiment.
(Adeptus Mechanicus: Magos Xenobiologis)
races.name: ratling

races.description:
The Tau are generally shorter than humans, smaller in stature and with less muscle mass and body weight. Every Tau is humanoid in shape, with two arms,[17] two cloven feet, and a single head. Their grey-blue skin is leathery and tough and exudes no moisture, owing to the generally dry conditions of their homeworld. Their faces are flat, wide around the eyes, and their olfactory organs are located inside their mouths. Their eyes can see into the infrared and ultraviolet. Tau eyesight is good, but they focus on distant objects slower than humans. The Tau are not very good in close combat, as they find the whole concept uncivilized.

The Tau has three digits and a single opposable thumb on each hand. The main difference from humans is the bone structure of Tau's lower legs, feet and ankles. Tau have shorter bones of the libia and fibia, but their feet have elongated cuneiform bones and talus and two large central weight-bearing toes. The Tau have eveolved to stand and move without using their heels.[17]
(Adeptus Xenobiologis: Tau, Kroot, Vespid)
races.name: Tau

races.description:
The Vespid are a unique race of insect-like aliens who are members of the T'au Empire. In the T'au Lexicon, they are called "Mal'kor." This derives from the T'au words for insect, "Mal," and air, "Kor." The soldiers of the Imperium of Man often refer to them as "Stingwings." The Vespids' homeworld is a gas giant also called Vespid, three light years to the galactic south of the T'au's D'yanoi Sept.
(Adeptus Xenobiologis: Tau, Kroot, Vespid)
races.name: Vespid
